uls-desc: Yana bawa ma'aikaci hanyoyi da dama da zai zaɓa harshe da kuma daidaita saituttuka na harshe.
ext-uls-undo-language-tooltip-text-local: Sauya harshen wannan Wiki ɗin. Duba [[Special:GlobalPreferences|global preferences]] zuwa sauya harshen dukkanin wikis.
uls-betafeature-desc: Nuna gajerar sifa na jerin harshe, tare da kawai harsunan da suke alaka da ku.
ext-uls-display-settings-desc: Saita harshe da ake amfani dashi a kosfi da irin rubutu
ext-uls-language-buttons-help: Sauya harshen kosfaye. ba zata shafa harshen kunshiya ba.
ext-uls-display-settings-anon-log-in-cta: [[Special:UserLogin|Log in]] dan zaban mabanbantan harshe daga kosfayen.
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-title: Sauke jerin lokacin da ake buƙata
ext-uls-webfonts-settings-info: Sauke irin rubuta kai tsaye da barin yadda ake zaban irin rubutocin.
ext-uls-webfonts-select-for-ui-info: Irin rubutu da aka yi amfani dashi a siffar ma'aikaci
ext-uls-webfonts-select-for-content-info: Irin rubutu da aka yi amfani ma kunshiya
ext-uls-input-disable-info: kayan aikin sanyawa an hana su.
ext-uls-input-settings-noime: Babu hanyar sanyawa dake kan aiki a wannan harshen.
ext-uls-input-disable-notification: Kayan aikin da ake sanyawa an hana su
ext-uls-input-disable-notification-info-: Zaku iya bari kayan aikin sanyawa a kowace lokaci daga saituttukan harshen ku.
zaku iya barin kayan aikin sanyawa a kowace lokaci daga saituttukan harshen a gaba da jerin harshe
ext-uls-compact-link-info: Dukkan harsuna (zabin farko daga mafi yawan zabi daga ku da wasu)
ext-uls-compact-language-links-preferenc: Yi amfani da  [[$1|jerin gamin harshe]], tare da harsuna masu alaka da ku.
ext-uls-compact-no-results: Wannan shafin babu shi a harshen da ka bincika
ext-uls-setlang-error: Akwai kure sanda ake sabunta harshen zabin ku da. Kure: $1
ext-uls-setlang-message: Linkin da kuka biyo ya nemi bayyana siffar a nuniya $1 ($2)
